TopicTitle: Game hangs in any spaceport buildings, gamebreaking as in restart don't solve this.

Articles.Content:
This screenshot shows the problem pretty well.

Then I press the exit to spaceport button, nothing happens except that I get the bottom bar and the top right side functions from the spaceport overview.

Pressing the exit to main menu button in bottom right corner gives the menu but I can not exit.

Launchpad is not affected, has tested science and mission controll building. Can not enter tracking station and VAB.

Is this an known issue?

-----

Main problem here is that this is game breaking, exiting the game and restart does not solve the problem.

Even worse, I have had this problem before, restoring an earlier save generated an lot of other problems:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/106045-Weird-issue-game-freezes-in-wab-then-purchasing-parts forcing me to restart.

I thought this was caused by installing extraplanetary launchpads with the karbonite support module and TAC life suport on an existing save however now the gamebreaking bug is back at around the same time as previous game broke.

Mods in use karbonite, extraplanetary launchpads with the karbonite support

TAC life support, mechjeb, kas, ActiveTextureManagement and hyperedit.

- - - Updated - - -

Looks like restoring an earlier save solved this for now.

However I would like to know if anybody has had the same issue as me.
Have you recently killed/fired any kerbals that had logged flight hours or been rescued as part of a contract?

Might explain it, I might have fired one who was rescued.

As I use extraplanetary launchpad I have some special requirements, I want engineers with low stupidity as they work best too construct stuff.

Thanks for the pic, for some reason I cannot upload here.

The exact same thing happens to me in Mission Control. Also game breaking, I have tried to run a career 6 times all with pretty much the same result.

you've gotten a little further in the game than I have, comparatively my game breaks when I start seeing collect science and rescue kerbal from orbits around Kerbin.

This screenshot shows the problem pretty well.

http://i.imgur.com/MHeVVIC.png

Then I press the exit to spaceport button, nothing happens except that I get the bottom bar and the top right side functions from the spaceport overview.

Pressing the exit to main menu button in bottom right corner gives the menu but I can not exit.

Launchpad is not affected, has tested science and mission controll building. Can not enter tracking station and VAB.

Is this an known issue?

-----

Main problem here is that this is game breaking, exiting the game and restart does not solve the problem.

Even worse, I have had this problem before, restoring an earlier save generated an lot of other problems:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/106045-Weird-issue-game-freezes-in-wab-then-purchasing-parts forcing me to restart.

I thought this was caused by installing extraplanetary launchpads with the karbonite support module and TAC life suport on an existing save however now the gamebreaking bug is back at around the same time as previous game broke.

Mods in use karbonite, extraplanetary launchpads with the karbonite support

TAC life support, mechjeb, kas, ActiveTextureManagement and hyperedit.

- - - Updated - - -

Looks like restoring an earlier save solved this for now.

However I would like to know if anybody has had the same issue as me.

- - - Updated - - -

I just checked a reply on one of my previous posts, apparently they have a sticky on this in Unmodded report area.
